name: Ark Fintech
description: Ark Fintech Group Inc., established in Colorado, USA, with a registered capital of $100 million, is an innovative and dynamic diversified fintech company. ARK FINTECH has a broad business portfolio, providing both traditional financial and emerging digital financial services, covering areas such as international bank cards, foreign exchange trading, and crypto asset management. Through advanced technology and financial innovation, ARK FINTECH is dedicated to creating a more open, transparent, and inclusive global Web3 digital payment ecosystem, meeting the diverse needs of users worldwide
